content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, can I have your name, please?
Oh dear, I think I did this before. I’m sorry, what do you need?
No problem at all! May I have your name so I can book your service?
Um, well, it’s the one on the bill. I forget what to put here. Is it the water one?
I understand. For our records, could you please tell me the full name you’d like us to use for your appointment?
It’s the one my daughter uses. I don’t like typing it, because it’s so long and odd. Do you really need it? I just need a plumber.
I understand, it can be a hassle! We do need your name to schedule a visit. If you’d prefer, you can tell me just your first name, or whatever is easiest.
I don’t think I can. Sorry, I keep getting confused with these forms.
reason: Customer unable or unwilling to provide name after repeated attempts.
